trans-unit.target: **注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a halo of color around objects or areas of color.
trans-unit.target: 创建的对象周围的颜色光环或区域的颜色。
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]位图效果都是呈现的软件。

trans-unit.source: Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software.
trans-unit.target: 应用效果任何对象也将在软件中呈现。

trans-unit.source: Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance.
trans-unit.target: 不应将位图效果应用于大型视觉对象或动画，因为这样做会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: OuterGlowBitmapEffect is one of several effects that are shipped with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_lhsdk](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-lhsdk-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: OuterGlowBitmapEffect 是附带的几种效果之一[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_lhsdk](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-lhsdk-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Other effects include: - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.EmbossBitmapEffect> - <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BevelBitmapEffect> The following illustration shows an OuterGlowBitmapEffect applied to a visual object (in this case applied to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>).
trans-unit.target: 其他影响包括:- <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>- <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.EmbossBitmapEffect>-<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BevelBitmapEffect>下图显示 OuterGlowBitmapEffect 应用到视觉对象 (在这种情况下应用于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BevelBitmapEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.EmbossBitmapEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurBitmapEffect>

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect](~/add/media/effects-outerglowsimple.png "Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect") The following illustrations show the effect of several basic properties of OuterGlowBitmapEffect.
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果](~/add/media/effects-outerglowsimple.png "屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果")下图显示的 OuterGlowBitmapEffect 的几个基本属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowSize%2A> property specifies the size of the halo glow: ![Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect") - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Noise%2A> property specifies the level of noise in the glow: ![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Opacity%2A> property specifies how transparent the glow is: ![Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values")
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowSize%2A>属性指定光环发光的大小︰![屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果")-<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Noise%2A>属性指定在发光的噪音级别︰![屏幕快照︰ 比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "屏幕快照︰ 比较 Noise 属性值")-<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Opacity%2A>属性指定如何透明发光为︰![屏幕快照︰ 比较发光不透明度属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "屏幕快照︰ 比较发光不透明度属性值")</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Opacity%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Noise%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowSize%2A>
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
要添加。
要添加。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光环发光的颜色。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The color of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 光环发光的颜色。
默认值为白色。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。
标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowColor*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowColor*>
要添加。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the thickness of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光环发光的厚度。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "屏幕快照︰ OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果") # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The thickness of the halo glow, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 厚度的光环发光[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of values is from 1 through 199.
trans-unit.target: 值的有效范围是从 1 到 199。
默认值为 20。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。
标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowSize*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowSize*>
要添加。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the graininess of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光环发光的颗粒度。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照︰ 比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "屏幕快照︰ 比较 Noise 属性值") # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The graininess (noise level) of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 光环发光的颗粒 （噪音级别）。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of values is from 0.0 through 1.0, with 0.0 specifying no noise and 1.0 specifying maximum noise.
trans-unit.target: 值的有效范围为从 0.0 到 1.0，其中 0.0 指无噪音，1.0 指最大噪音。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0.5 表示 50%噪音，值 0.75 表示 75%噪音，依此类推。
默认值为 0.0。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。
标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Noise*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Noise*>
要添加。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the halo glow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光环发光的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values") Opacity can also be specified using the alpha value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果︰![屏幕快照︰ 比较发光不透明度属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "屏幕快照︰ 比较发光不透明度属性值")还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.GlowColor%2A>的 alpha 值指定不透明度

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The opacity level of the glow.
trans-unit.target: 发光不透明度级别。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates that the halo glow is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the glow is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0，则表示光环发光完全透明，如果值为 1，则表示发光完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates the glow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the glow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0.5 表示发光为 50%不透明，值为 0.725 表示发光透明度为 72.5%不透明，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 将被视为 1 值。
默认值为 1。
**注意︰ 此 API 现已过时。**
未过时的替代方法是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BlurEffect"> </xref>。
标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Opacity*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.OuterGlowBitmapEffect.Opacity*>
要添加。
要添加。
